cryptanalysis.breaking

Class BreakingVigenereCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptanalysis.breaking.BreakingVigenereCipher

  • public class BreakingVigenereCipher
extends Object
    Class that will break and decrypt text that has been encrypted with Vigen√®re cipher. Finds out the key length and then guesses used key word.

    • Method Detail

      • analyzingText

        public int analyzingText(String text)
        Makes set of 3 from letters in text and counts length differences. Puts set (3 letter combinations) indexes to the list.
        Parameters:
        text - encrypted text
        Returns:
        best guess of the key length used in encryption

      • countDiff

        public int countDiff(MyArrayList<String> list,
                     MyHashMap<String,MyArrayList<Integer>> blocks)
        Counts length differences of 3 letter sets. Uses sets of 3 letters that appears more than once. Counts differences of each 3 letter combination. Puts factors and how many time they appear to HashMap.
        Parameters:
        list - list of 3 letter sets
        blocks - map of 3 letter sets and their length differences
        Returns:
        countedKeyLehgth

      • countedKeyLength

        public static int countedKeyLength(MyHashMap<Integer,Integer> differences)
        Counts key length that is most probable based on factors.
        Parameters:
        differences - HashMap where is factors and how many of each factors there is
        Returns:
        suggested key length

      • guessingKey

        public String guessingKey(String text,
                          int keyLength)
        Goes through text and counts frequencies for each set of letters. Then shifts each letter of most probable letter on that part.
        Parameters:
        text - encrypted text
        keyLength - length of the keyword
        Returns:
        guessed key
